languages.text: {n}Чуть помолчав, Соломон с чувством добавляет:{/n} "Вот сволочь, ушел все-таки от правосудия".
{n}After a pause, he adds, with feeling,{/n} "The bastard escaped justice after all."
languages.original_text: {n}Чуть помолчав, Соломон с чувством добавляет:{/n} "Вот сволочь, ушел все-таки от правосудия".

traits.locale_text: {n}After a pause, he adds with feeling,{/n} "The bastard escaped justice after all."

{n}After a pause, he adds, with feeling,{/n} "The bastard escaped justice after all."

languages.text: {n}他顿了顿，感慨地补充了一句。{/n}“这个混蛋终究是逃过了法律的制裁。”
languages.original_text: {n}After a pause, he adds, with feeling,{/n} "The bastard escaped justice after all."

traits.locale_text: {n}他顿了顿，感慨地补充了一句。{/n}“这个混蛋终究是逃过了法律的制裁。”

languages.text: {n}Tras una pausa, añade con intensidad:{/n} «El malnacido escapó a la justicia, después de todo».
languages.original_text: {n}After a pause, he adds, with feeling,{/n} "The bastard escaped justice after all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras una pausa, añade con intensidad:{/n} «El malnacido escapó a la justicia, después de todo».

languages.text: {n}déclare Solomorne avant de reprendre d'un ton plus haché.{/n} Ce misérable a finalement réussi à échapper à la justice. »
languages.original_text: {n}After a pause, he adds, with feeling,{/n} "The bastard escaped justice after all."

traits.locale_text: {n}déclare Solomorne avant de reprendre d'un ton plus haché.{/n} Ce misérable a finalement réussi à échapper à la justice. »

languages.text: {n}少し間を置いてから、彼は感情を込めて付け加えた。{/n}「結局、あのろくでなしは裁きを逃れました」
languages.original_text: {n}After a pause, he adds, with feeling,{/n} "The bastard escaped justice after all."

traits.locale_text: {n}少し間を置いてから、彼は感情を込めて付け加えた。{/n}「結局、あのろくでなしは裁きを逃れました」

languages.text: {n}Duraksadıktan sonra duyguyla ekliyor.{/n} "Şerefsiz, adaletten kaçmayı başarmış."
languages.original_text: {n}After a pause, he adds, with feeling,{/n} "The bastard escaped justice after all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Duraksadıktan sonra duyguyla ekliyor.{/n} "Şerefsiz, adaletten kaçmayı başarmış."

languages.text: {n}Nach einer Pause fügt er nicht ohne Regung hinzu:{/n} "Ist der Mistkerl der Gerechtigkeit also doch entgangen."
languages.original_text: {n}After a pause, he adds, with feeling,{/n} "The bastard escaped justice after all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einer Pause fügt er nicht ohne Regung hinzu:{/n} "Ist der Mistkerl der Gerechtigkeit also doch entgangen."
